forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco greets the morning with mostly sunny skies, ushering in a pleasant day characterized by moderate temperatures. The high will hover around a comfortable 62 degrees, perfect for those seeking a gentle embrace of warmth amid the summer. As the day unfolds, a leisurely shift will see temperatures dip slightly into the early afternoon chill, accompanied by a west-southwest breeze that brings just enough refreshment. With gusts occasionally nudging 22 mph, the wind adds a lively but manageable edge to the atmosphere.

As twilight descends, expect a soft transition to mostly cloudy skies, a gentle reminder that the coastal fog might not be far away. By nightfall, temperatures will settle around 53 degrees, suggesting layers might be wise for evening excursions. This is a day made for quiet wanderings—perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the proximity to the bay offers glimpses of the shifting marine layer, or a visit to a local café to savor a warm beverage while watching the gentle play of light against clouds gathering after sunset. Remember, a light jacket should accompany your ensemble; a comforting layer for the cool evening that beckons.
